arts.ttl: RFEF reelases VAR audio from controversial penalty during Levante vs Barcelona
arts.sum: The Royal Spanish Football Federation (RFEF) has released the VAR audio from one of the most debated moments of Barcelona’s 3-2 comeback win over Levante. The incident in question was the penalty awarded for Alejandro Balde’s handball, which allowed Jose Luis Morales to score Levante’s second goal of the match. arts.ttl: Barcelona forward reacts after making the difference against Levante – ‘I see myself as a starter’
arts.sum: Barcelona forward Ferran Torres once again proved his worth as he started for the second consecutive match and scored in the thrilling 3-2 comeback win over Levante. His performance highlighted not only his attacking instincts but also his ability to step up when the team needed him most. arts.ttl: Barcelona maestro questions referee decision after controversial handball vs Levante – ‘It wasn’t a penalty’
arts.sum: Barcelona midfielder Pedri was one of the standout figures in Barcelona’s dramatic 3-2 comeback win against Levante. His stunning goal shifted the momentum of the game, reducing the deficit and setting the stage for victory. arts.ttl: Barcelona roars back to win 3-2 at Levante as Atletico Madrid drops more points
arts.sum: Defending champion Barcelona needed Pedri González and Ferran Torres to score early in the second half to equalize after the newly promoted Levante had rolled to a surprise two-goal lead at halftime. Atletico Madrid stumbled for a second straight game to start the season after squandering its lead in a 1-1 draw with promoted Elche.

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick talks Raphinha, Rashford, Balde, penalty incident after Levante 2-3 Barcelona
arts.sum: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick shared his thoughts after his side’s dramatic 3-2 win against Levante. The German coach admitted the first half was not easy for his players, with Levante defending deep and threatening on the counter-attack. arts.ttl: Yamal inspires Barça rally for late win at Levante
arts.sum: Barcelona came from two goals down to beat Levante 3-2 and make it successive wins to start their season.

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford is subbed off at HALF-TIME as Barcelona stage a stunning comeback to seal 3-2 win over Levante
arts.sum: The 27-year-old made his first start on the left wing, with Raphinha down the middle behind Ferran Torres and Lamine Yamal on the right - but he failed to make a significant impact.

arts.ttl: The Lamine Show: Yamal inspires Barca to stunning comeback victory over Levante
arts.sum: Barcelona come from two goals behind to record a 3-2 victory over Levante in Saturday night's La Liga clash at Estadi Ciutat de Valencia.

arts.ttl: Pedri 9.0, Raphinha 8.0 | Levante 2-3 Barcelona: Player ratings
arts.sum: A sensational comeback from Barcelona sees them beat Levante away from home. Despite being 2-0 down at half-time, Hansi Flick’s men mounted a great comeback. Ultimately, Barça manage to take away all three points and continue their winning ways after their victory in the La Liga opener against RCD Mallorca.
